name: Eye Care
desc: Eye Care is an app which is beautifully designed to help you to take care of your eyes. It provides you a way to keep records of their prescription in the cloud and access them from anywhere.

screenshots.alt: Eye Care home screen screenshot in dark mode
Eye Care add reports screen screenshot in dark mode

features.headline: Personalized eye report tables
features.description: Create and manage personalized eye report tables with ease. Keep track of prescribed eyeglass prescriptions.

features.headline: Share your  eye reports
features.description: Enhance communication with your eye care specialist by generating shareable eye reports as screenshots.

features.headline: Sync your reports
features.description: Your eye health data is stored securely in the cloud. Access your eye reports anytime, anywhere, from multiple device.

faqs.question: How to share reports?
faqs.answer: You can share your reports using share button.
